PTYPE.name: PHY_LB_PO_VL_INTERFACE
PTYPE.ext_help: (Ethernet interface type) (Loopback interface type) (PortChannel interface type) (Vlan interface type)

PTYPE.name: URL
PTYPE.help: Enter the string URL in one of the following formats:

PTYPE.name: PROTO
PTYPE.pattern: ip(ip) ipencap(ipencap) icmp(icmp) igmp(igmp) tcp(tcp) udp(udp)

PTYPE.name: NETWORK_TYPE
PTYPE.ext_help: (Specify OSPF broadcast multi-access network) (Specify OSPF point-to-point network)

PTYPE.name: LOG_SEVERITY_LEVEL
PTYPE.pattern: log-emerg(log-emerg) log-alert(log-alert) log-crit(log-crit) log-err(log-err) log-warning(log-warning) log-notice(log-notice) log-info(log-info) log-debug(log-debug)

PTYPE.name: SA_URL
PTYPE.help: http[s]://DomainOrIP[:port][/resource].IPV6 should be enclosed in [] when specifying port number

PTYPE.name: DAYS_OF_WEEK_TYPE
PTYPE.help: number of weekday (0-6 corresponds to mon,tue,wed,thu,fri,sat,sun)

PTYPE.name: RT
PTYPE.help: A.B.C.D:NN or NN:NN or MMMM:NN or NN:MMMM

PTYPE.name: IGMP_LAST_MEM_QUERY_INTERVAL
PTYPE.help: Last Member Query Interval value (Default: 1000 ms)

PTYPE.name: PHY_VL_PO_LB_INTERFACE
PTYPE.ext_help: (Ethernet interface type) (PortChannel interface type) (Vlan interface type) (Loopback interface type)

PTYPE.name: VRF_NAME
PTYPE.help: VRF name (prefixed by Vrf, Max: 15 characters)

PTYPE.name: ECN_OPTION
PTYPE.pattern: none(ecn_none) green(ecn_green) yellow(ecn_yellow) red(ecn_red) green_yellow(ecn_green_yellow) green_red(ecn_green_red) yellow_red(ecn_yellow_red) all(ecn_all)

PTYPE.name: UDP_FORWARDING_PORT
PTYPE.pattern: tftp(69) dns(53) ntp(37) netbios-name-server(137) netbios-datagram-server(138) tacacs(49)

PTYPE.name: PHY_VL_PO_INTERFACE
PTYPE.ext_help: (Ethernet interface type) (PortChannel interface type) (Vlan interface type)

PTYPE.name: MAC_AGE_TIMER
PTYPE.ext_help: MAC aging time in seconds. Enter 0 to disable MAC aging (default = &MAC_AGE_TIMER_DEF_VALUE;)
